testcase.name: Positive Case. As a user, I want to successfully create Digital Bank account
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to Digital Bank signup page............................passed When User creates account with follwoing fields with mocked email and ssn...passed Then User should be displayed with the message "Success Registration Successful. Please Login.".passed

testcase.name: Negative Test Cases. As a Digital Bank Admin I want to make sure users can not register without providing all valid data
